instructions: Make sure you update the Chromecast to the latest version of its firmware. While the Chromecast can work without an internet connection, its firmware has to be up to date. On your primary device, open a Google Cast-ready app and click the "Cast" button. 3. The primary device will begin to search for nearby compatible devices. Find the screen you want to cast to and select it. A four-digit pin will display on the screen. Enter this pin into your Chromecast app to connect the devices. Your Android device should now be connected and you can cast media you have stored locally to the screen that's connected to the Chromecast.
